### Task 3: Exploratory Data Analysis - Retail
###### Problem Statement : Try to find out the weak areas where you can work to make more profit.
source.5527a487:
### California west zone has highest sale and profit as per data and about 2001 superstore so one should not work there. 
### Some states were all the business or superstore earend profit are these 
1. Wyoming                                                              
2. West Virginia                                                                
3. Maine                                                   
4. District of Columbia                                                        
5. North Dakota                                                           
6. Vermont                                                          
7. South Dakota                                                                

### The above state are good location to open new superstore
### In this Wyoming is the state where you can work to make more profit as there is only 1 superstore category furniture and sub category chair and that also earned profit so any there are high chances that other superstore will work there but it will be best if of copiers Sub-Category and Technology category can be opened as it made huge profit at other places.
### West Virginia is the weak areas where you can work to make more profit as there is only 1 paper shop at east are so one can set up paper store at other 3 regions also.
### Texas is the state where there are 985 super stores and has a highest lose so one should pay attention to it and not open any new shop there but try to reduce the loss at that state
### Pennsylvania, Illinois, Ohio also had to many losses instead of to many shops so attention should be paid to them also.
